descriptionProfile: Artist, and Satellite Foundation Ambassador. Enquiries: phil@chiliphilly.com
Artist, and Satellite Foundation Ambassador. Enquiries: phil@chiliphilly.com

posts.description:
Well I had a big weekend lol

But throwback to these two @lashitposts potheads @muy.fabulosa and myself at the opening of Slice of Life at @craftvictoria!  Thanks @sophiatron for asking me to be a part of the show!

Hope everyone is well X

Hey guys!

So I made this rice bowl hat because this year I'm an official ambassador for Oaktree's Live Below The Line Campaign!  I'll be participating by living on $2 a day for 2 days.

Live Below the Line raises funds for education initiatives in the Asia-Pacific region to end poverty and empower youth!  If you wanna join, head to bit.ly/lbl-17 and sign up!

If you wanna donate to me, hit the link in my bio!

Thanks everyone!

Did anyone just hear me having a good ol' chat on the radio? Thanks @lewishobba abd @veronicamilsom for having me!! But more importantly thanks to @australiandesigncentre and everyone who came to my exhibition opening last night! I had so much fun seeing and catching up with everyone!

The last few weeks in Sydney have really reenergized me in the sense of making new work, and I can't wait to show everyone what I wanna do!

Anyway my Artist Talk is at ADC at 2pm so come if you wanna ask me questions HAHA

Anyway TGIF, have a good weekend everyone! (Thanks @jesshallay for the pic!) üì∑üì∑üì∑üì∑üì∑

Sometimes your friends go to @commbank and see your giant smiley face looking back!

A few weeks ago I was Australian of the Day, because of my collaborations with The Satellite Foundation.  The best part of what I've been able to do are the experiences and the people I've met but most importantly the people I may have helped in different ways without knowing it!

Anyway thanks @sosavy91 for the photo, it made my week/day/month!

#84: NO POINT CRYING OVER SPILT MILK.

TAG A MATE WHOS AN UGLY CRIER!

DAIRY THEME?! So I've been busy over the last few weeks but I should remind you about seeing my work over at @michaelreidsydney which leaves soon! If you can't go in person you can check it out at michaelreid.com!

Also my bio still has the link to come see YUMMY!

Follow me on Snapchat of you feel and I have a new separate Instagram for when I wear these out and about @thediningroomtable. 
Anyway I need to have a long hard sleep.

Hope everyone has had a solid weekend!

#82: MOOOOO!üêÑ So I got asked to make two hats for @yvcheese for their 14 days of cheese tastings at the #SydneyRoyalEasterShow, at the #sydneyshowground in the @woolworths_au Fresh Food Dome, 17 ‚Äì 30 of March! 
They are letting everyone have #freetastings of some of their great #cheese (which I‚Äôve been craving since they asked) but also if you want to purchase any, they have a $15 show special of three cheeses and a cooler bag! 
And even better, you can take a photo with them! 
So if you guys are heading to the #sydneyshow, you should totally check out my hats in person! #yarravalleycheese #woolworthsfreshfooddome @sydney_royal_easter_show 
I hope everyone has had a great week!

#81: 'Queer Dinosaur'

Continuing the theme of the weekend, I got to work with @bluethumbart on creating this dinosaur hat inspired by #bluethumbartist Kim Leutwyler's awesome painting 'Queer Dinosaur'. (She's an LGBTQ activist and #Archibald2015 Finalist.) But also you have the chance of WINNING this!

To enter the competition:
Just follow @bluethumbart. 
Hat's off to you! #artuncovered 
Hope everyone is still having a fun weekend!

#80!: RAIN-BEAU üòòüë®üèª So this time last year I was about to head to Sydney Mardi Gras for the first time! @kieranhenry took a photo of me and stuck a rainbow around my head and now a year later, I've made it a reality!

So tomorrow is my artist talk at the Bundoora Homestead Art Centre! It's on at 3-4pm but if you wanna have a chat, come earlier because I won't have anytime to talk afterwards!

The reason I won't have anytime after is that I'll be hopping straight onto the plane to Sydney to be in the Sydney Mardi Gras parade! I'll be on a float with @kirstfred wearing this hat and more! Also thanks @andydexterity for asking me to be a part of it! Super excited!

SO if you wanna follow me about while I'm in Sydney, you can follow my Snapchat: thechiliphilly as well!

This is a lot for one post, hope everyone has a fun weekend!

#79: WILL YOU ACCEPT THIS ROSE?! üåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπSo today is #valentinesday and it's a day you are meant to show that extra special someone how much you love 'em!

If you don't have a #Valentine, then who better to show love to than yourself! In the words of @rupaulofficial 'If you don't love yourself, how in the hell are you gonna love somebody else?' üåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπüåπI literally made this in a few hours to post today, so I hope everyone has had a good weekend!!

#78: Don't Be Such A Tea-Bag aka All Tea, No Shade aka Don't Teabag Me

So much happening over the next few weeks!

I start my residency at the Bundoora Homestead Art Centre soon, with my artist talk being on the 5th of March. 
I'll also be having a piece in the @austapestry AIR exhibition which opens on the 23rd of Feb, 6 - 8 pm!

I'll also be heading to Sydney next month too for a few fun things I'll talk about later!

Hope everyone has a great weekend!

#77: Chacaron Macaron

Ueueueueuhuheuhwuhwuheuh!

Has anyone ever heard the song Chacaron Macaron? It's great!

I realized I have a busy few months coming up! One of the big things is that I'm gonna be doing my artist residency this year at the Bundoora Homestead Art Centre!

I'll be there from 26th of Feb to April 3rd, 11-4 Thursday - Friday! I'll also be doing an artist talk on the 5th of March! So you have plenty of time to come visit and have a chat!

Hope everyone has a good weekend!

#76: Burger Hat 2.0

You are probably like 'Phil you already posted a burger hat.' To which I say 'I know, I made it myself.' BUT I recorded myself making this  guy up and once the video is ready, I'll finally have my first video up on YouTube!

So if anyone has ideas of what you want to see me make, let me know and I'll see how I go!

Hope everyone is having a PLEASANT weekend! üçîüçîüçî
